title: John Glen – 2019 Speech at RMB Global Cities Dialogue
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by John Glen, the Economic Secretary to the Treasury, to the RMB Global Cities Dialogue on 18 June 2019.

[![](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/johnglen.jpg)](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/johnglen.jpg)
